Package propra.imageconverter.handler

Class ByteHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • propra.imageconverter.handler.ByteHandler
  • public class ByteHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Byte Handler can be used to convert between byte arrays and other primitive data types. All handled byte Arrays are in Little Endian format.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ByteHandler()

      Converts a byte array, starting at offset, into a long with byte order Little Endian.

        public static short byteArrayToShort​(byte[] bytes,
                                     int offset)
        Converts a byte array, starting at offset, into a short with byte order Little Endian.
        Parameters:
        bytes - byte array to be converted.
        offset - start at offset.
        Returns:
        short represented by given byte array, starting at offset.
